perturbation.original_text: Following the completion of such maintenance term, Bankers Bank may, at its option, renew maintenance for subsequent periods of one (1) year each, subject to adjustments proposed by Netzee not to exceed 5% at least sixty (60) days in advance of the applicable renewal date.
perturbation.changed_text: Following the completion of such maintenance term, Bankers Bank may, at its option, renew maintenance for subsequent periods of one (1) year each, subject to adjustments proposed by Netzee not to exceed 5% at least fifteen (15) days in advance of the applicable renewal date.
perturbation.explanation: Reducing the notification period for renewal adjustments to 15 days may be deemed unreasonable, especially considering that the agreement applies to banking services. Courts often require reasonable notice periods for contract changes, and 15 days is unlikely.
perturbation.contradicted_law: General contract law principles regarding reasonable notice for modifications

perturbation.original_text: Maintenance provided by Netzee during the term of this Agreement shall include (2) 5x12 call-in support between hours of 6:30 a.m. and 6:30 p.m. Eastern Time Monday through Friday
perturbation.changed_text: Maintenance provided by Netzee during the term of this Agreement shall include (2) 5x8 call-in support between hours of 9:00 a.m. and 5:00 p.m. Eastern Time Monday through Friday
perturbation.explanation: Reducing the call-in support hours from 5x12 to 5x8 constitutes a significant reduction in the service provided. This could be a contradiction, depending on banking regulations around service support, but it is likely a breach of contract.
perturbation.contradicted_law: Breach of Contract and General Contract Law

perturbation.original_text: and (4) availability of basic Services with at least 99% uptime between 4:00 a.m Monday and 7:00 p.m. Friday and between 8:00 a.m. Saturday and 2:00 p.m. Saturday Eastern Time, exclusive of outages caused by off-peak prescheduled maintenance or causes beyond Netzee's reasonable control (including third-party equipment or communications).
perturbation.changed_text: and (4) availability of basic Services with at least 90% uptime between 4:00 a.m Monday and 7:00 p.m. Friday and between 8:00 a.m. Saturday and 2:00 p.m. Saturday Eastern Time, exclusive of outages caused by off-peak prescheduled maintenance or causes beyond Netzee's reasonable control (including third-party equipment or communications).
perturbation.explanation: Reducing the uptime guarantee from 99% to 90% significantly decreases the reliability of the service. If banking regulations or industry standards require a higher level of uptime for critical systems, this change would violate those requirements.
perturbation.contradicted_law: Potential violation of banking regulations or industry standards regarding system uptime
